name: 2 GB Full-Size SD Cards (Assorted Brands) – Standard SD, not SDHC
description:
Giving away a small batch of 2 GB standard SD memory cards. These are full-size (not microSD) and are the older, lower-capacity type that many legacy cameras, photo frames, label printers and embedded devices still require. Each card is 2 GB (Standard SD/SDSC) with a write-protect switch. Brands are mixed—examples include SanDisk and Verbatim. They are ideal for devices that only support up to 2 GB non-SDHC cards. Cards will be clean-formatted before handover; FAT/FAT16 is recommended for older gear. The giveaway includes the 2 GB SD cards only.

Condition is mixed: some are new old stock in packaging and some are open-pack/used but working. All items are given as-is. Please check that your device needs Standard SD (2 GB); many newer devices expect SDHC/SDXC and larger capacities, so these cards are intended for older equipment.

Preferred recipients are anyone with genuine need, especially caregivers or organisations maintaining legacy cameras or similar devices.

Do not leave the microwave unsupervised as it can go on and on without stopping. If not suitable  for beneficiaries, please let me know, I will dispose by 1 Sept.
